about_the_game:
Set out on an enchanting, turn-based puzzle adventure as Sophia, a brave young heroine guided by the wisdom of Athena. In this cozy yet challenging journey, navigate through intricate mazes and mystical landscapes inspired by ancient Greek mythology.

Traverse through beautifully designed worlds controlled by powerful deities like Medusa, Zeus, and Hades. Each realm presents unique challenges, from Medusa's petrifying gaze in the Mind Maze to Zeus's electrifying trials in Zeus's Sky Sanctuary.

Use your wits to overcome a variety of obstacles. Redirect Medusa's deadly gaze with mirrors, neutralize Zeus's lightning traps, and find your way through Hades' treacherous underworld.

Enjoy a heartwarming story filled with moments of wonder, courage, and growth. With each step, Sophia gets closer to retrieving the missing artifact and restoring balance to her village.

Immerse yourself in the vibrant art and soothing sounds of the ancient world. Each level is meticulously crafted to bring the myths to life in a way that's both nostalgic and fresh.

Join Sophia on her quest to outsmart the gods, restore her village, and prove that even the smallest heroes can overcome the mightiest challenges.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 11.0 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Join Sophia, a shy yet curious heroine, in a turn-based puzzle adventure. Solve intricate puzzles and face mythical beings to save her village. Explore landscapes and uncover stories inspired by Greek mythology in a journey of courage, growth, and the discovery of true connection.
